name: Gabbyville
description: Gabbyville consists of a team of Virtual Receptionists that provide the most exceptional customer service around.  They feel social interaction has taken a back seat in this high-tech world and they want to bring back what people are craving...that personal touch and basically hearing a live voice!  A great service for small to medium sized businesses that do not have the flexibility of hiring a full-time, onsite Receptionist.  Live & Local, not Automated & Outsourced.
